basics.name: Tiger Oakes
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: Software developer with 10 years experience. Built 2 mobile web browsers & hundreds of open source projects.

highlights: Wrote specifications for new web features as member of the **World Wide Web Consortium**.
Managed communication and collaboration with **over 50 open source contributors** and returning volunteers.
Collaborated with several global teams such as GeckoView, Platform, and UX to ship a finished product.
Built and shipped brand new web browser to **over 500,000 users on Google Play Store**.

Served as one of the **feature leads for Progressive Web App support** in Firefox Preview,
providing a native look and feel to **thousands of web apps**.
Added Trusted Web Activity support to Firefox, **featured in Chrome Dev Summit 2019 keynote**.
Built internal tool used by entire Google Chrome for Android team with **JavaScript** and **Python**.
Used **streams** and **worker threads** to handle 180 MB downloads, rendering partial data in under 1 second

work.summary: Vancouver startup simulating skin for VFX and prototyping clothing
highlights: Built **TypeScript Electron** client that interfaces with **C++** server to display 3D simulations with **WebGL**.
Migrated large program from **jQuery** to **React**, **Redux**, saving time and effort for future programmers.
Built new web search page feature in **Flow**, **React**, **Redux**, and **Python** displayed to **1,000,000 users monthly**.
Led hackathon team to build new product for in-restaurant experience which was picked up by sales team.

work.company: Centre for Sustainable Food Systems at UBC Farm
highlights: Developed custom **TypeScript** software and wrote fill algorithm to classify farm fields.

work.summary: #1 custom home builder in Hawai'i, building private resort residences.
highlights: Designed and developed web portfolio, including GPU-accelerated parallax using **CSS** 3D transformations.

projects.name: Open Source
highlights: Maintainer for **Rollup**, a popular JavaScript bundler written in TypeScript with **900,000 weekly downloads**.
Built Maskable.app developer tool. Recommended by Google & CSS Tricks and is **used over 2,500 times/month**.
Wrote web development articles for **CSS Tricks**, **MDN**, and **Google web.dev** with thousands of views.
Implemented advanced configuration feature with **JavaScript** in Google's Travis Size Report.
Added support for new commands with **Node.js** to appium-adb to interface with **Android** devices over USB.

awards.title: Grand Prize: Congressional App Challenge 2014, Hawaiiâ€™s 2nd Congressional District
